document_data.name: Sornyn
document_data.activities:
Planning and signing treaties and agreements
Meeting envoys and foes
document_data.My enemy is like a brother to me.\n|Typi: }}) was a three-day-long festival held between [[Flamerule 3]] and [[Flamerule 5]]. It was one of twelve [[High Festivals]] that celebrated [[Waukeen]]. In [[Waterdeep]], the holiday also honored [[Lathander]].
document_data.Activities:
During the three days of the festival, celebrants planned business operations and signed meetings and agreements. It was also common for envoys to be sent and received at different locations, including between enemies and between locations unknown to each other. Copious amounts of [[wine]] were consumed during the festival, accompanying all the meetings.

People endeavoring to start a new business or project were encouraged to meet potential partners and funders during this holiday.
document_data.History: On a warm Sornyn evening sometime in the mid‒14{{th}} century [[DR]], the author [[Volothamp Geddarm]] signed the agreement to begin writing  ''[[Volo's Guide to Waterdeep (in-universe)|Volo's Guide to Waterdeep]]''.
